page.title: 14RECREATION IN WIDNES
page.content: { THE WIDNES GOLF CLUBS} The{Widnes golf club}opened in 1924 and was built on land bought from the I.C.I.The{St.Michaels Jubilee golf {club}was built on the chemical waste tips and the rubbish dump.You do not need to be a member to play a round and it only costs 90p. { WIDNES RUGBY CLUB Rugby was first played in{1873.Mr {Frank Myler} played for Widnes after he left school and has played at {Wembley}4 times.{Mr Vin Karalius}has played for Widnes and now manages them from his home in the the I.O.M.They play in black and white at {Naughton Park. { KINGSWAY LEISURE CENTRE} It took 2 years to build and has been open for 2.5 years.The baths take 5 days to fill.There have been several accidents but no deaths in the pool.
